sidebar.title: Shaun Shawn
sidebar.author: Alanis Morrisette
sidebar.intro: A decade as anchorman behind the NewsHD news desk has seen Shaun Shawn become a household name in over three houses in America. Widely known as being able to exaggerate the importance of even the smallest news scoop, Shaun makes it his business to know your business. Some call him nosey but he calls it ‘knowsy’.
sidebar.article:
Shaun Shawn

unde omnis A decade as anchorman behind the NewsHD news desk has seen Shaun Shawn become a household name in over three houses in America. Widely known as being able to exaggerate the importance of even the smallest news scoop, Shaun makes it his business to know your business. Some call him nosey but he calls it ‘knowsy’.

sidebar.title: Peter Bird
sidebar.author: Shirley Manson
sidebar.intro: Peter Bird PhD arrived at NewsHD in 2015 bringing a lifetime of experience. While he is fairly new to our viewers he claims in England his wit was a thing of note and that his sense of humour is dryer than crisp crumbs in a desert. Our latest market research focus group described him as ‘barely watchable’ and ‘odd’ and ‘British’.
sidebar.article:
Heading 3
